original_text: And he that burneth her shall wash his clothes in water, and bathe his flesh in water, and shall be unclean until the even.
korean_text: 송아지를 불사른 자도 자기의 옷을 물로 빨고 물로 그 몸을 씻을 것이라 그도 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: shall wash his clothes in water
and bathe his flesh in water
and shall be unclean until the even
